title: shankara dayAkarA
sahitya:
shankara dayAkarA caraNa kamalam tuNai sarva jagadIshvarA pArvathI manOharA


anupallavi

  pangayanum mAdhavanum tEdum malarp-pAdanE
 bhakta kOTigaL paNiyum kailAsa nAthanE


caraNam    onrum ariyAp pEdai un perumai enna kaNDEn
oppuyurvillA undan uruvazhagai en sholvEn
manril naTamADum uyar vilaiyErum perumAnE
malaraDi tudikkum rAmadAsan mA davamE
